body:
The title says it all, I noticed that 3 guys, Dil, Javi and Oscar have this rank.

Out of curiosity, what is an advisor?  The colors are similiar to the refs and officials so is it a tourney rank?
body_tagged:
The title says it all, I noticed that 3 guys, Dil, Javi and Oscar have this rank.

Out of curiosity, what is an advisor?  The colors are similiar to the refs and officials so is it a tourney rank?
title: What is an Advisor?

replies.body: An Advisor is like an official, but we don't do as much of the organising of the tournaments. We only do more on match days.
replies.body_tagged: An Advisor is like an official, but we don't do as much of the organising of the tournaments. We only do more on match days.

replies.body: We tell the refs where to go and watch over games.
replies.body_tagged: We tell the refs where to go and watch over games.

replies.body:
Official - Event Coordinators. They plan events, promote refs, organize tournaments, etc. The Admins of Tournament Staff.
Advisor - Direct refs what matches to watch, and help coordinate on actual match days. The Senior Mods of tournament staff

Since you have seen multiple answers, each summing it up, I am going to lock this to prevent spam. Please feel free to ask an Advisor or an Official in-game about their rank!
